from vpython import *

# Define pendulum parameters
Length_I = 10
Radius_I = 1
g = 9.8
theta = 0.1

# Create pendulum objects
ceiling = box(length=0.2, height=0.2, width=0.2, color=color.blue)
ball = sphere(radius=Radius_I, color=color.red)
rod = cylinder(radius=0.01)

def set_pendulum_position():
    ball.pos = vector(Length_I*sin(theta), -Length_I*cos(theta), 0)
    rod.axis = ball.pos - ceiling.pos
    rod.length = Length_I
    ball.radius = Radius_I

# Set initial pendulum position
set_pendulum_position()

# Time step
dt = 0.01

while True:
    rate(100)
    alpha = -g*sin(theta)/Length_I
    theta = theta + alpha*dt
    set_pendulum_position()
